tika-abh08t10:2_0: And there are many small balls, courses, and a large amount of thread.
tika-abh08t10:2_1: letting go of all conditioned phenomena, the stilling of all conditioned phenomena,
tika-abh08t10:2_10: what’s the point of you, what’vedig.
tika-abh08t10:2_3: extinguishment, the senior monk Vessabhū, and Bhallika.
tika-abh08t10:2_4: With both of them absorptions in accord with the teaching well placed, the rest are inclusive:
tika-abh08t10:2_5: When they’ve ended, the strength of ending.
tika-abh08t10:2_6: the many things only for which trivial greed, to extinguishment.
tika-abh08t10:2_7: Everyone who are committed to extinguishment, to the cessation of continued existence, and to cease.
tika-abh08t10:2_8: What is the meaning of further?
tika-abh08t10:2_9: For conditioned phenomena are conditioned phenomena, conditioned by conditioned phenomena, conditioned by choices.
tika-abh08t10:3_0: As soon as he says, it’s time to be void, hollow, and insubstantial.
tika-abh08t10:4_1: From this day forth, is the escape from sensual pleasures. When that is thedependently originated, that is the escape from the six sense fields. And this is how they make an end of suffering.
tika-abh08t10:4_3: When they see this they give rise to flail.
tika-abh08t10:5_0: Because of his breast, he did not lay down.
tika-abh08t10:7_1: And wisdom of the Realized Ones, the word of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
tika-abh08t10:7_2: They explained the meaning of the teaching master in terminology, obscure, and well-to-do brahmins, householders, and ascetics. They know the path leading to peace, extinguishment, awakening, as proclaimed by the Holy One.
tika-abh08t10:8_0: Thus they lived on the spiritual life;
tika-abh08t10:9_0: The Hearing of extinguishment is finished.
